description: Alterations and restoration to the existing property for use as a single family dwelling including: the removal of the existing  lower ground floor level single storey extension, and erection of new single storey extension/garden room; reconfiguration of external levels and steps with new finishes; increase boundary wall height to match No.42 Carlyle Square and alterations to gated entrance; relocation of utilities and plant; refurbishment to building facade, balconies and railings; new bi-fold doors to garden; renewing roof finishes; removal of wheelchair lift; replacement of glazed extension;  new glazing to windows; internal re-decoration throughout; repairs/alterations to staircase and balustrade; mechanical/electrical works including new air conditioning and CCTV cameras; rainwater good goods repair.
